info.title: NetSuite REST Record API
info.description: NetSuite REST Record API generated 2020-02-27 at 15:25:54 UTC for account 5743578_SB1, user ryanwjackson@gmail.com with role LedgerSync.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query used to filter results

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit used to specify the number of results on a single page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset used for selecting a specific page of results.

parameters.name: replace
parameters.description: Names of sublists on this record. All lines on these sublists will be replaced with lines from input. Sublists not specified here will have lines added to record. Names are delimited by comma.

parameters.name: X-NetSuite-PropertyNameValidation
parameters.description: Sets strictness of property name validation.

parameters.name: X-NetSuite-PropertyValueValidation
parameters.description: Sets strictness of property value validation.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Internal identifier

parameters.name: expandSubResources
parameters.description: Set to "true" if you want to automatically expand all sublists, sublist lines and subrecords on this record. Default value is "false"

parameters.description: externalId
